title: Sample, "Superwool"
medium:
Medium: wool (60%) and cotton (40%)
Technique: plain weave foundation with weft-faced plain weave facing effect binding with every 7th warp
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 28.6 x 30.5 cm (11 1/4 x 12 in.)
description: Weft-faced plain weave in dark yellow with a plain weave foundation. Weft-facing yarns are coarse and loosely twisted. Foundation weave consists of brown warp threads and dark brown weft threads. Number 138.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, "Superwool".
Medium: wool (60%) and cotton (40%)
Technique: plain weave foundation with weft-faced plain weave facing effect binding with every 7th warp. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-876.
